data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.5 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.3 PB 1
data.actual_result: It isn't bold and often not easy readable.
data.expected_result: The mention and user name should be bold as for the desktop client to be clearly visible and readable.

data.steps_to_repro: - Mention any user, role, everyone or here or just have a look at the user names in the chat - Observe the user name or role name, user mention, `@everyone`/ `@here` mention font size/style in the mention (not the whole message itself)
